about_me.des: I build the prototype you need for your start-up. Bring your idea to life!

projects.Prototype: I build the prototype you need for your start-up.
projects.Consulting: I can bring my expertise in robotics, programming and mechatronics.
projects.Training: Training around robotics with simulation and real robots (with ROS).

career.firststudy_des: First we will define together what exactly you need for your application. We define the specifications
career.study_des: Define all the specifications. Setting deadlines.
career.delivery_des: Time to deliver your product and make sure all your expectation are satisfied
